hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to selumetinib. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   selumetinib .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to sildenafil. Manufacturer advises monitor or adjust sildenafil dose with moderate CYP3A4 inhibitors.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   sildenafil .  Manufacturer advises monitor or adjust  sildenafil  dose with moderate CYP3A4 inhibitors .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to simvastatin. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to siponimod. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on other drugs taken—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   siponimod .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on other drugs taken—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir increases the concentration of sirolimus. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   increases   the concentration of   sirolimus .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: St John's wort is predicted to decrease the concentration of letermovir. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: St John's wort   is predicted to   decrease   the concentration of   letermovir .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to sunitinib. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   sunitinib .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the concentration of tacrolimus. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the concentration of   tacrolimus .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to tadalafil. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Teriflunomide is predicted to increase the concentration of letermovir. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir is predicted to increase the exposure to tezacaftor. Manufacturer advises adjust dose with moderate CYP3A4 inhibitors, see tezacaftor with ivacaftor and tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tezacaftor .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose with moderate CYP3A4 inhibitors, see  tezacaftor with ivacaftor  and  tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Letermovir given with a potent CYP2C19 inhibitor is predicted to increase the exposure to tofacitinib. Manufacturer advises adjust tofacitinib dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Letermovir   given with a potent CYP2C19 inhibitor   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tofacitinib .  Manufacturer advises adjust  tofacitinib  dose .
